member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Editor.IVsFontsAndColorsInformation.AddLanguageService(System.Guid)
member.summary: Adds an additional language service that contributes to coloring information of this class. This method can be used to add additional color sources where multiple buffers of the same font and color category guid have varying language service GUIDs.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Editor.IVsEditorAdaptersFactoryService
member.summary: A factory service for creating Editor Adapter objects and mapping between such objects and the underlying new editor objects.
member.remarks: This is a MEF Component, and should be exported with the following attribute: [Export(NameSource=typeof(IVsCodeWindowFactoryService))]

member.summary: Create an IVsTextBuffer.

member.summary: Create an IVsTextBuffer with a specified content type.
member.param: The IServiceProvider with which to site the IVsTextBuffer.
The for the underlying .
member.remarks: This operation is intended for text buffers that will be initialized by IVsTextBuffer.InitializeContent.

member.summary: Create an IVsTextBuffercoordinator.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Editor.IVsEditorAdaptersFactoryService.GetDataBuffer(Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextManager.Interop.IVsTextBuffer)
member.summary: Get the DataBuffer of an IVsTextBuffer adapter (this is the top buffer of the data model buffer graph). This buffer will be the same as the DocumentBuffer except in BufferCoordinator scenarios.
member.param: The text buffer adapter of interest.
member.returns: Null if this method is called before content has been established for the adapter, otherwise the DataBuffer that is presented to the view model.
member.exception: was not produced by this factory.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Editor.IVsEditorAdaptersFactoryService.GetDocumentBuffer(Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextManager.Interop.IVsTextBuffer)
member.summary: Get the DocumentBuffer of an IVsTextBuffer adapter (this is the bottom buffer of the data model buffer graph). This buffer will be the same as the DataBuffer except in BufferCoordinator scenarios.
member.param: The text buffer adapter of interest.
member.returns: Null if this method is called before content has been established for the adapter, otherwise the DocumentBuffer that is presented to the view model.
member.exception: was not produced by this factory.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Editor.IVsEditorAdaptersFactoryService.GetWpfTextView(Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextManager.Interop.IVsTextView)
member.summary: Get the WpfTextView of an IVsTextView adapter.
member.param: The text view adapter of interest.
member.returns: Null if this method is called before content has been established for the adapter, otherwise the IWpfTextView that presents the text in the UI.
member.exception: was not produced by this factory.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Editor.IVsEditorAdaptersFactoryService.GetWpfTextViewHost(Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextManager.Interop.IVsTextView)
member.summary: Get the WpfTextViewHost of an IVsTextView adapter.
member.param: The text view adapter of interest.
member.returns: Null if this method is called before content has been established for the adapter, otherwise the IWpfTextViewHost that presents the text in the UI.
member.exception: was not produced by this factory.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Editor.IVsEditorAdaptersFactoryService.SetDataBuffer(Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextManager.Interop.IVsTextBuffer,Microsoft.VisualStudio.Text.ITextBuffer)
member.summary: Set the DataBuffer of an IVsTextBuffer adapter that is being used together with an IVsTextBufferCoordinator adapter.
member.param: The buffer adapter of interest.
The new data buffer.
member.exception: was not produced by this factory.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Editor.IVsEditorAdaptersFactoryService.GetBufferAdapter(Microsoft.VisualStudio.Text.ITextBuffer)
member.summary: Get the IVsTextBuffer adapter for this text buffer (if it exists).
member.param: The text buffer of interest.
member.returns: Null if no adapter exists, or else the adapter.
member.remarks: Adapters are generally built only for document windows.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Editor.IVsEditorAdaptersFactoryService.GetViewAdapter(Microsoft.VisualStudio.Text.Editor.ITextView)
member.summary: Get the IVsTextView adapter for this text view (if it exists).
member.param: The text view of interest.
member.returns: Null if no adapter exists, or else the adapter.
member.remarks: Adapters are generally built only for document windows.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Editor.IVsTextViewCreationListener
member.summary: A listener for when a text view adapter () is created and initialized that has matching roles and was created over a text data model having a matching content type. Exporters must specify at least one ContentTypeAttribute and one TextViewRole, and should mark their export using the following attribute: [Export(typeof(IVsTextViewCreationListener))], along with [ContentType] and [TextViewRole].

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Editor.IVsTextViewCreationListener.VsTextViewCreated(Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextManager.Interop.IVsTextView)
member.summary: Called when a adapter has been created and initialized.
member.param: The newly created and initialized text view adapter.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Editor.IVsVisibleTextMarkerTag
member.summary: These tags are generated from the visible legacy markers created using .CreateLineMarker and .CreateStreamMarker.
member.remarks: No extension should produce these tags.
